(No/ice given 28 February 1989.) *2 . MR TICKNER: To move-That this House: 30 mins (I) notes the development of agribusiness in Australia; and (2) calls on the relevant Government departments to devise strategies to: (a) control appropriately the activities of agribusiness companies; (b) limit further concentration of ownership of their companies; (c) develop alternatives to agribusiness; (d) encourage research to enable farmers to move towards more sustainable agricultural practices; and (e) provide guidelines for the operation of agribusiness in Australia (Notice given 8 March 1989).
